entity.name: [EC Test] Trump ends press briefing early after question on COVID-19 testing

text:
.@PressSec Kayleigh McEnany has spent much of this WH briefing lashing out at former Pres Obama accusing the Obama administration of not having a sufficient national stockpile and of leaving "empty shelves" for Trump.

(WH pandemics office was dismantled by Trump administration.)
